ACTIVITY.TITLE: Activity
ACTIVITY.SUBTITLE: Basic Network Address Translation

STEP.DESCRIPTION:
Drag the correct IP Address and place into the NAT Translation table. Host-A and Host-B are both communicating with the WWW server. Router-A is using dynamic NAT with a pool of addresses assigned by the ISP.
When done, click the Check button.

ACTIVITY.MESSAGE:
Congratulations, this activity has
been successfully completed.
